file_content.text: Lord Razer to all forces. Today, you will burn this sector to bone.
Survive, and I will anoint you with my blood. You will be my Legion of Terror! Die, and I will climb your corpses to victory.
Bomber squadrons: Launch! Victory for Razer!
It is done. Aegis Base is destroyed--generals incinerated, troops scattered and forced to retreat.
You've done very well, Major. Return to the war room now.
You've done very well, Lieutenant. Return to the war room now.
